turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a Blonde Espresso Americano from the Starbucks on Nicholasville Road, Lexington, Kentucky.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Could you repeat which Starbucks that was please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Nicholasville Road in Lexington, Kentucky.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, and what size did you want your Blonde Espresso Americano.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just standard 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks. So you said you want a grande Blonde Espresso Americano with 2% milk from Starbucks on Nicholasville road.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did I get that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total for this order will be $4.50. Should I place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, before you do, would there be any extra charge to add a bit of honey to that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is a 50 cent charge for honey. Did you want to add this to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I may as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cool. So you'll be ordering a Grande Blonde espresso Americano with 2% milk and honey from Starbucks on Nicholasville road.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the cost is updated to $5.00.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your drink has been ordered. It should be ready for pick up in 9 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll send your receipt to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. I believe that was it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else You need today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cool, take care.
